enWisdom: Patience is the shield against poverty
Patience is the [best] resource for [tackling] poverty
Displaying neediness gives rise to poverty

Wisdom: الصَّبْرُ عَلَى الْفَقْرِ مَعَ الْعِزِّ أَجْمَلُ مِنَ الْغِنَى مَعَ الذُّلِّ
enWisdom: Patience in poverty with dignity is better than wealth with indignity
Whoever manifests his poverty, lowers his status

Wisdom: مِنَ الْوَاجِبِ عَلَى الْفَقِيرِ أَنْ لَا يَبْذُلَ مِنْ غَيْرِ اضْطِرَارٍ سُؤَالَهُ
enWisdom: It is obligatory on the poor that he should not put forward his request [to others] unless he has no other choice
The hardships of poverty are preferable to facing humiliation
